npcs.name: Nymia Starweaver
npcs.quote: Magic is a gift, but it's only through hard work and determination that one can wield it properly.
npcs.appearance: Nymia is a slender half-elf with long, flowing silver hair and piercing blue eyes. She wears a deep blue robe adorned with intricate silver embroidery, and carries a gnarled staff that glows with arcane energy.
npcs.personality: Nymia is a serious and studious individual, but always willing to lend her knowledge and assistance to those in need.
npcs.definingmoment: Nymia's life changed when she witnessed the destruction wrought by a group of reckless adventurers who had carelessly wielded an artifact of immense power. From then on, she has dedicated her life to studying and understanding magic, in order to prevent such disasters from happening again.
npcs.plothook: Nymia seeks out the party, seeking their help in recovering a stolen grimoire containing a powerful but dangerous spell. She believes that the individual who stole it may be planning to use it for nefarious purposes.
npcs.secret: Nymia's mother was an elf, but her father was a powerful human sorcerer whom she never got to know.
npcs.quirk: Nymia has a habit of talking to herself while studying, which can make her seem a bit eccentric.
